text: @NYGovCuomo Please QUIT saying “The government(including Trump)doesn’t understand...”!! They/Trump “understand” very well what is happening to the US, whether abt COVID19, Human Rights, Rule of Law, etc. By now, saying “they don’t understand” is insulting to Americans.
